.. gyre-lc documentation master file, created by

Python Walkthrough
==============================

This chapter provides a walkthrough of using the MSG Python interface to evaluate flux and intensity spectra for a model of Sirius (ùõº Canis Majoris). The code fragments are presented as a sequence of Jupyter notebook cells, but pasting all of the fragments into a Python script should work also.



.. make sure you include the build_spectrum script in the bundle

.. note:: This project is under active development.
